nars.language

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object

      • nars.language.Variable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Term>

    public class Variable
extends Term
    A variable term, which does not correspond to a concept
